task.title: Displaying topic titles instead of file names in a .DITAMAP file

context.p: If you open a ditamap (or bookmap) in the Author mode in Oxygen, you will instantly notice that all the topicref elements are by default displayed according to their file name.

steps.stepsection: To change the file names of topicref elements in a .DITAMAP file to their corresponding topic titles, proceed as follows:

step.cmd: Select the Styles button in the toolbar: .
In the selection menu that appears, select the option + Show topic titles.

info.note: Another useful option in the Styles selection menu is + Edit topicref attributes inplace which allows you to adjust the attributes specific to each topic within the ditamap in which these topics are referenced.
